name: Make Up Free - Fashion Glow Makeover Salon & Celebrity Spa Boutique
name_original: Make Up Free - Fashion Glow Makeover Salon & Celebrity Spa Boutique
description:
HOT - HOT - HOT FREE GAME!
Pick your style - then get in touch with your make up inner artist! Have fun while creating a masterpiece. Design and Apply hair and makeup applications then share with friends via email, facebook, twitter.

*******************************
= TOP FREE KIDS GAME OF 2013
= TOP 10 WORLDWIDE
******************************

Customize your look...
-Select from one of the beautiful models
-Pick a hairstyle
-Choose makeup colors
-Don't forget to add accessories

Check out the screenshots and see for yourself, you won't be disappointed!
